title: SCP-3844-3
content:
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION 

You are currently viewing an out of date version of this file that has been preserved for posterity. Please note that information presented herein may be misleading or incorrect. 

//Changes from the previous iteration are highlighted in ##blue|blue##//

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

**Item #:** SCP-3844

**Object Class:** Euclid

**Special Containment Procedures:** --While proper facilities are under construction-- SCP-3844 is to be contained at its dwelling within the Dolomite Mountains. A 100m x 100m perimeter is to be regularly patrolled by Foundation personnel to ensure no civilians come into contact with SCP-3844. 

Anti-aircraft artillery is to be positioned around SCP-3844's dwelling. --Artillery is to fire at any airborne entities over the containment perimeter. Any evidence of the existence of SCP-3844 is to be attributed to bombing runs.-- ##blue|Artillery is only to be used in the event of a full scale containment breach.## 

Once a week, one --D-Class-- ##blue|member of the SCP-3844 project## is to be sent to interact with SCP-3844, ##blue|and take temperature and radiation measurements. A team of researchers are to take size measurements, perform IQ tests, and determine the maximum temperature of fire SCP-3844 can expel once per month.## Personnel caught stealing items from SCP-3844 are to be disciplined accordingly.

##blue|SCP-3844 is to be provided with the following reading material as part of its monthly measurements:##
* ##blue|Time Magazine##
* ##blue|Science Magazine##
* ##blue|Nature Magazine##
* ##blue|Communications of the ACM##

**Description:** SCP-3844 is a winged reptile, measuring --73.76m-- ##blue|50.22m## from tail to head, and with a wing span of --67.42m-- ##blue|42.78m##[[footnote]] According to most recent measurements.[[/footnote]]. It is estimated to mass --27,000kg-- ##blue|18,000kg##. SCP-3844's scales are of a --purple-- ##blue|blue## hue, except around the stomach where they are much lighter. SCP-3844 is capable of --expelling fire at 3400°C from its mouth through an unknown method-- ##blue| forcefully expelling a methane vapor from its mouth (achieving temperatures as high as 1950°C), and igniting it through unknown means.##

SCP-3844 is capable of speech in --at least 14-- ##blue|7## languages, and has --an extensive--  ##blue|moderate## knowledge of world events. During direct interactions with personnel, SCP-3844 takes the form of an adult male, however SCP-3844 ##blue|claims it## can mimic the appearance of any human. 

SCP-3844 inhabits an immense cavern that contains --a currently unquantified amount of valuable metals-- ##blue| 2.69x10^^6^^kg of valuable metals (approximately 2.6 billion US dollars)##. SCP-3844 often burrows underneath these materials, where it presumably sleeps. 

##blue|In conversation, SCP-3844 has confirmed that it is the inspiration behind a number of european myths involving dragons. It also claims to be the model for the Welsh flag[[footnote]] "I used to be red you know. A vibrant red to match the fire I'd breathe. Those were indeed good days."[[/footnote]].## 

**Addendum:** The following is a transcript of an interview between --Dr. Lester Fegmont-- ##blue|O5-2## and SCP-3844.

> ##blue|<**Begin Log**>##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** I see you've finally returned. A few years late, but I guess that's only to be expected.##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** Yes, I guess I am a little late. Sorry about that.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** Don't worry about it. You're obviously busy, and in the meantime, I've had all manner of new reading material. How long had you known about the nature of light?##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** //[smiles]// Decades at least.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** And the inner workings of our smallest building block?##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** We cracked open the atom during the war.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** Before long you might have an explanation for my kind!##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** Well, you'd be surprised how far science can get you. My division has discovered that some things aren't even anomalous in the first place.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** So, has science finally found a way to let me stretch my wings?##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** Unfortunately, due to certain advances in radar, we can't risk you leaving the cavern. However, I've asked others to devise a way to possibly... expand your home.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** Oh have you? I'm looking forward to this now.##
> 
> ##blue|**O5-2:** I do have to be on my way. Hopefully I will see you again.##
> 
> ##blue|**SCP-3844:** I hope so as well.##
> 
> ##blue|<**End Log**>##
